
## Data and Identification for <code>id_estimate</code> {.unnumbered}


### Description

<code>idealdata</code> objects contain the relevant legislator/bill (person/item) matrix of data along with slots containing information
about the kind of identification used in the estimation.



### See Also

<code>id_make</code> to create an <code>idealdata</code> object suitable for estimation with <code>id_estimate</code>.
